streak.title: Streak Rules
streak.description: How the consecutive days system works
streak.calculationDesc: Comparison between last_active_date and current date. Same day keeps it. Previous day increments. Otherwise resets to 1.
streak.breakDesc: Skipping a day (not accessing the app for 24h+) resets the streak to 1.

history.title: History System
history.description: How XP is tracked and audited

alerts.spamProtectedDesc: Limit of 15 transactions with XP per day. From the 16th, transaction is created normally but without XP. Resets at 00:00 in user's timezone.
alerts.reversalDesc: When a transaction is deleted or edited, the earned XP remains. No rollback mechanism exists.
alerts.fixedXpDesc: All transactions give +5 XP, regardless of value. No distinction between $1 or $10,000.

howToAdd.question: How do I add a transaction?
howToAdd.answer: Tap the '+' button in the bottom navigation bar. Choose if it's income or expense, fill in the amount, description and category, then tap 'Add'.

whatIsXP.question: What is XP and how does it work?
whatIsXP.answer: XP are experience points you earn by logging transactions and completing quests. As you accumulate XP, you level up and unlock achievements!

howPremium.question: How do I become Premium?
howPremium.answer: Go to Settings > Upgrade to Premium. There you'll see exclusive benefits and can choose the plan that best fits you.

deleteAccount.question: Can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: Yes! Contact us through the message form or WhatsApp and we'll process the complete deletion of your data.

changeLanguage.question: How do I change the app language?
changeLanguage.answer: Go to Settings > Language and select between Portuguese, English or Spanish.

multipleWallets.question: Can I have multiple wallets?
multipleWallets.answer: Yes! You can create as many wallets as you want: checking account, savings, cash, etc. Access the Wallets section to manage them.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using MoneyQuest, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: MoneyQuest is a personal finance management app with gamification elements. We offer free and premium features to help you manage your finances in a fun and engaging way.

section3.title: 3. User Account
section3.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

section4.title: 4. Premium Subscriptions
section4.content: Premium plans are charged according to the billing cycle chosen. You can cancel your subscription at any time. Refunds are processed according to our refund policy.

section5.title: 5. Acceptable Use
section5.content: You agree not to use the service for illegal or unauthorized purposes. You must not, in the use of the service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: MoneyQuest is not responsible for financial decisions made based on information provided by the app. The information is for educational and personal organization purposes only.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For questions about these Terms of Use, contact us through the Support page in the app.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email, and financial data you enter in the app. We also collect usage information to improve our services.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send important notifications, and personalize your experience in the app.

section3.title: 3. Data Protection
section3.content: Your data is stored securely with end-to-end encryption. We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with service providers who help us operate the app, always under confidentiality agreements.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section5.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze service usage, and personalize content. You can control cookie usage through your browser settings.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also request data portability or revoke consent at any time.

section7.title: 7. Compliance
section7.content: MoneyQuest complies with applicable data protection regulations. To exercise your rights or clarify questions, contact us through the Support page.
